31#define FP_NO_EXACT_UNDERFLOW
32#include "soft-fp.h"
33#include "double.h"
34#include "quad.h"
35
36TFtype
37__extenddftf2 (DFtype a)
38{
39 FP_DECL_EX;
40 FP_DECL_D (A);
41 FP_DECL_Q (R);
42 TFtype r;
43
44 FP_INIT_EXCEPTIONS;
45 FP_UNPACK_RAW_D (A, a);
46#if (2 * _FP_W_TYPE_SIZE) < _FP_FRACBITS_Q
47 FP_EXTEND (Q, D, 4, 2, R, A);
48#else
49 FP_EXTEND (Q, D, 2, 1, R, A);
50#endif
51 FP_PACK_RAW_Q (r, R);
52 FP_HANDLE_EXCEPTIONS;
53
54 return r;
55}
56
